stdc 10 fltr2d 1 bldc 10 fltr2d 1 double_crochet fo trim ends to around 2 5cm / 1 inch and block if necessary 2 © rosina plane www rosinaplane com uk terms in partnership with chart notes read the chart from bottom to top right to left left to right if you are left-handed the first and last sts of each row are always double_crochet worked in both loops and indicate the colour you will be using for the whole row you do not change colours within each row the colours on the chart are there only to give you an idea of how the piece should look important copyright notice i hope you have enjoyed making my design please respect the work it has taken to create this pattern for you and do not sell on copy or claim these instructions as your own in any way if you wish to share the pattern you may do so only by linking to the original documents in my website or ravelry / etsy / love crafts shop as applicable you may sell items made from this pattern but you must use your own photos of your own work in all advertising and other sales materials you are not permitted to use any of my photos and you are not permitted to add my charts or written instructions in full or in part to pinterest or any other social media sites rosina contact hello@rosinacrochets uk 3 © rosina plane www rosinaplane com
